definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: Mrs…has never really got on with her daughter-in-law.
sentences.chinese: 老太太從未與兒媳婦兒真正和睦相處過。

sentences.english: She was a very kind and amiable old woman.
sentences.chinese: 他是個善良和氣的老太太。

sentences.english: An old women found out a empty bottle which had ever been filled the best wine .
sentences.chinese: 一個老太婆找到一個不久前曾裝過最好陳酒的空酒瓶。

sentences.english: The old lady came tottering out of the room.
sentences.chinese: 老太太顫巍巍地走出屋來。

sentences.english: The first day of school our professor introduced a little old lady to us.
sentences.chinese: 開學第一天，教授把一位小個子老太太介紹給了我們。

sentences.english: The little old lady pulls off her knickers and lifts up her dress.
sentences.chinese: 只見小老太太脫下短褲，撩起上衣。

sentences.english: The old woman told him that she had two grandsons at the front.
sentences.chinese: 老太太告訴他說，前線上有她兩個孫子。

sentences.english: Yeah, the killer was completely unfeeling. He even killed old ladies!
sentences.chinese: 看了，那個殺手真是慘無人道，連老太太都殺。

sentences.english: The old lady at the desk leered at her knowingly.
sentences.chinese: 辦公桌旁的老太婆會心地斜睨了她一眼。

sentences.english: The carline is fond of prying into others's things.
sentences.chinese: 這位老太婆愛打聽別人家的事。

sentences.english: Ep560 - Old Madam Hong tries to persuade Zhizhong stop his evil deeds, but Zhizhong ignores her.
sentences.chinese: 洪老太苦口婆心勸志忠勿再做壞事，但志忠不加理會。

sentences.english: The old lady came back from her dreams of that far-off romance."Perhaps
sentences.chinese: 老太太從她那久遠的愛之夢中醒過神來。

sentences.english: The old lady is pottering around in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 那老太太在花園了磨洋工。

sentences.english: May be that person who had the adobe house or that old woman who broke her leg?
sentences.chinese: 也許這人的土坯房倒了，或者這位老太太的腿受傷了。

sentences.english: The soldiers were billeted on an old lady.
sentences.chinese: 士兵們已安頓在一位老太太家裏。

sentences.english: A thief eased the old lady of her purse.
sentences.chinese: 小偷偷走了那位老太太的錢包。

definition: old man or woman/the elderly/one's aged parents or grandparents
uncle (polite form of address for older male)
(coll.) father's father's mother/paternal great-grandmother/respectful form of address for an old woman
(of an elderly couple) husband or wife
(coll.) father's older brother/uncle/term of respect for older man
old man/I (an old man referring to himself)
erhua variant of 老伴[lao3 ban4]
